title: Orcish ring mail
data:
**[English]()** • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Orcish_ring_mail/zh-CN "Orcish ring mail/zh-CN")

| \[   orcish ring mail   [![Orcish ring mail.png](/images/e/e2/Orcish_ring_mail.png)](/wiki/File:Orcish_ring_mail.png) |                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Appearance                                                                                                            | crude ring mail                                        |
|                                                                                                                       |                                                        |
| Slot                                                                                                                  | [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor")            |
| AC                                                                                                                    | [2](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                   |
| Special                                                                                                               | - [MC1](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation") |
|                                                                                                                       |                                                        |
| Base price                                                                                                            | 80 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                       |
| Weight                                                                                                                | [250](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                           |
| Material                                                                                                              | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                              |

**Orcish ring mail** is a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, It is made of [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron"), and appears as **crude ring mail** when unidentified.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 History](#History)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.2 dNethack](#dNethack)
  - [5.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [6 References](#References)

## Generation

[Orcish](/wiki/Orc_\(starting_race\) "Orc (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of orcish ring mail's appearance.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Orcish [Barbarians](/wiki/Barbarian "Barbarian") start the game with orcish ring mail in place of standard [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

In addition to random generation, general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store") and used armor dealerships sell orcish ring mail.

## Description

While worn, orcish ring mail grants 2 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and [MC](/wiki/MC "MC")1.

## Strategy

Orcish ring mail is as heavy as standard ring mail for one less point of [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), and orcish Barbarians should swap it for whatever armor they can find as soon as possible. For Barbarians and other roles alike, even [leather armor](/wiki/Leather_armor "Leather armor") of the same enchantment is preferable: it weighs 100 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum") less, and does not interfere with [spellcasting](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") for magic-focused characters.

## History

Orcish ring mail first appears in [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0").

## Variants

Some variants may give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish ring mail.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

### dNethack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), orcish chain mail grants 1 AC, 1 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 125 aum (half of its weight in vanilla *NetHack*).

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

Orcish chain mail can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining an [orcish helm](/wiki/Orcish_helm "Orcish helm") and an [orcish shield](/wiki/Orcish_shield "Orcish shield").

All of this information also applies to [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 860](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L860)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 46](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L46): *Barbarian starting inventory*
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 220](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L220): *Racial substitutions for orcish characters*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Orcish ring mail

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   orcish ring mail  
Appearance crude ring mail
Slot body armor
AC 2
Special
  • MC1
Base price 80 zm
Weight 250
Material iron

Orcish ring mail is a type of body armor that appears in NetHack, It is made of iron, and appears as crude ring mail when unidentified.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 History
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 UnNetHack
    • 5.2 dNethack
    • 5.3 EvilHack
  • 6 References

Generation

Orcish characters start the game with knowledge of orcish ring mail's appearance.[1] Orcish Barbarians start the game with orcish ring mail in place of standard ring mail.[2][3]

In addition to random generation, general stores and used armor dealerships sell orcish ring mail.

Description

While worn, orcish ring mail grants 2 base AC and MC1.

Strategy

Orcish ring mail is as heavy as standard ring mail for one less point of AC, and orcish Barbarians should swap it for whatever armor they can find as soon as possible. For Barbarians and other roles alike, even leather armor of the same enchantment is preferable: it weighs 100 aum less, and does not interfere with spellcasting for magic-focused characters.

History

Orcish ring mail first appears in NetHack 3.0.0.

Variants

Some variants may give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish ring mail.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

dNethack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, orcish chain mail grants 1 AC, 1 DR and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 125 aum (half of its weight in vanilla NetHack).

EvilHack

In EvilHack, orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

Orcish chain mail can be created at a forge by combining an orcish helm and an orcish shield.

All of this information also applies to Hack'EM.

References

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 860
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 46: Barbarian starting inventory
  3. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 220: Racial substitutions for orcish characters

For Barbarians and other roles alike, even [[leather armor]] of the same enchantment is preferable: it weighs 100 [[aum]] less, and does not interfere with [[spellcasting]] for magic-focused characters. ==History== Orcish ring mail first appears in [[NetHack 3.0.0]]. ==Variants== Some variants may give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish ring mail. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. ===dNethack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], orcish chain mail grants 1 AC, 1 [[DR]] and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 125 aum (half of its weight in vanilla ''NetHack''). ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], orcish ring mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. Orcish chain mail can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining an [[orcish helm]] and an [[orcish shield]]. All of this information also applies to [[Hack'EM]]. ==References== {{nethack-367}} [[Category:Body armor]] [[Category:Orcish items|Ring mail]]
